lines.text: Can you turn that music... up?
You just made it your dayem business.
Uh... Mr. Stevens, are you so sure this is the place? I mean maybe it's just me, but you can't see shit out here. Ya know?
I've got major news for you. The world can be as big as you want it to be, or as small as your tiny little hood.
Hey look at this, the childrens are back from the playGROUUUUUUUND.
First of all I ain't a teacher. Second I'm in a real shitty mood. And third no law says I can't make it my business. So let the kid go.
All right, you wanna sleep on the bus, sleep on the bus.
I like the beach - I will sleep on the beach.
This time I play for keeps.
And this time... I don't play.
I got a roof over my head. That's all I need right now.
Tell you what. You come work for me and train my guys, and I'll give you a roof over your head like you wouldn't believe.
And all the coke I can snort, right?
